name: explicatory
content:

Add to word list
giving an explanation about something: The text includes a short introduction and some explicatory footnotes. The exhibits were accompanied by long explicatory leaflets. Synonyms
explanative
explanatory

explication
More examplesFewer examplesThere were some explicatory notes to accompany the exhibition.According to the explicatory leaflet, the show will move to New York next year.His first collection of poems seems to contain more explicatory prose than actual poetry.This paper includes explicatory clarification of some of my claims.
